name: vscode-unity-color-preview
description: Inline color previews for Unity's Color and Color32 constructors in C# (e.g., new Color(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.25f))
author: Clockworked

scripts.optimize-gif: gifsicle --optimize=3 --colors=128 --lossy=80 media/color-preview.gif -o media/color-preview-optimized.gif && mv media/color-preview-optimized.gif media/color-preview.gif
scripts.check-gif: echo 'GIF file size:' && ls -lh media/color-preview.gif && echo 'GIF dimensions:' && gifsicle --info media/color-preview.gif | head -5
